Package ca.gkelly.engine.graphics

Class TileMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.gkelly.engine.graphics.TileMap
  • public class TileMap
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used to load and render a .tmx tilemap

      java.awt.Polygon getPoly​(int x, int y, java.lang.String layer)
      Get the polygon that contains the point, from the selected layer
      java.awt.image.BufferedImage getTile​(int ID)
      Get the image associate with a specific tile ID
      boolean load()
      Load the tiled map, and all associate resources, into memory This can be used to create many maps on startup, but only load them as needed

    • Method Detail

      • load

        public boolean load()
        Load the tiled map, and all associate resources, into memory This can be used to create many maps on startup, but only load them as needed

      • render

        public java.lang.Object[] render​(int[] tl,
                                 int[] br)
        Get a cropped version of the map
        Parameters:
        tl - Top-left
        br - Bottom-right
        Returns:
        Array containing:
        - [0]: BufferedImage Cropped Image
        - [1]: int X offset
        - [2]: int Y offset

      • getTile

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage getTile​(int ID)
        Get the image associate with a specific tile ID
        Parameters:
        ID - The ID of the tile
        Returns:
        The image associated with the selected tile

      • getPoly

        public java.awt.Polygon getPoly​(int x,
                                int y,
                                java.lang.String layer)
        Get the polygon that contains the point, from the selected layer
        Parameters:
        x - The x value of the point
        y - The y value of the point
        layer - The layer to search
        Returns:
        The polygon that contains the point
        null if no polygon contains the point null if the layer doesn't exist
